enhanced_description: Mindtera is a digital platform designed to help leaders and organizations, including schools, build a sustainable workforce by optimizing employee (and student) well-being, efficiency, and productivity. Founded in 2021, the platform emphasizes human resources as the most valuable asset, asserting that improved well-being directly supports organizational growth and individual flourishing. It offers solutions like professional coaching, a data-driven Employee Assistance Program (EAP) for stress reduction and work-life balance, 360-degree performance analytics, and ESQ Group Coaching for soft skills development, focusing on emotional and social intelligence. Mindtera also includes a School Assistance Platform (SAP) to optimize student-teacher-parent connectivity and development. Its objectives include building a more diverse and inclusive workforce and accelerating skill development and learning efficiency.
